content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position (y)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position y)

### Iron plate production facility at position (z)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position z)
- Assembling machine (position a)
- Inserter (position b) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position c) that connects the furnace at position z to the assembling machine at position a

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have sufficient quantities of all required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, iron-gear-wheel requires iron-plate, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary resources for crafting and extraction tasks.
